title: Russian billionaire Potanin acquires minority stake in cloud provider Selectel
description: MOSCOW, Dec ‌29 : A joint venture controlled by Russian billionaire Vladimir Potanin has acquired a 25 per cent stake in IT infrastructure provider Selectel, one of the venture's partners said on Monday, as Moscow seeks to boost development of home-grown artificial intelligence models.Catalytic People, a jo
